summary: This module implements HTTP proxying functionality in Apache HTTP Server, providing both forward and reverse proxy capabilities. It supports load balancing, worker configuration, and various proxying strategies.

logs.message_template: LoadFactor must be a number between 1..100
logs.reason: Logs an error when the LoadFactor parameter is outside the valid range of 1-100
logs.resolution: Adjust the LoadFactor value to be between 1 and 100

logs.message_template: Retry value has wrong format
logs.reason: Logs an error when the Retry parameter format is invalid
logs.resolution: Provide the Retry value in a valid time format (e.g., 30s)

logs.message_template: Retry must be at least one millisecond
logs.reason: Logs an error when the Retry parameter is too small
logs.resolution: Increase the Retry value to at least 1ms

logs.message_template: TTL must be at least one second
logs.reason: Logs an error when the TTL parameter is too small
logs.resolution: Increase the TTL value to at least 1 second

logs.message_template: Min must be a positive number
logs.reason: Logs an error when the Min parameter is negative
logs.resolution: Set a positive value for the Min parameter

logs.message_template: Max must be a positive number
logs.reason: Logs an error when the Max parameter is negative
logs.resolution: Set a positive value for the Max parameter

logs.message_template: Smax must be a positive number
logs.reason: Logs an error when the Smax parameter is negative
logs.resolution: Set a positive value for the Smax parameter

logs.message_template: Acquire timeout has wrong format
logs.reason: Logs an error when the Acquire timeout parameter has an invalid format
logs.resolution: Provide the Acquire timeout in a valid time format (e.g., 500ms)

logs.message_template: Acquire must be at least one millisecond
logs.reason: Logs an error when the Acquire parameter is too small
logs.resolution: Increase the Acquire timeout to at least 1ms

logs.message_template: Timeout value has wrong format
logs.reason: Logs an error when the Timeout parameter has an invalid format
logs.resolution: Provide the Timeout value in a valid time format (e.g., 60s)

logs.message_template: Timeout must be at least one millisecond
logs.reason: Logs an error when the Timeout parameter is too small
logs.resolution: Increase the Timeout value to at least 1ms

logs.message_template: IOBufferSize must be >= 512 bytes, or 0 for system default.
logs.reason: Logs an error when the IOBufferSize parameter is less than 512 bytes and not 0
logs.resolution: Set IOBufferSize to at least 512 bytes, or use 0 for system default

logs.message_template: ReceiveBufferSize must be >= 512 bytes, or 0 for system default.
logs.reason: Logs an error when the ReceiveBufferSize parameter is less than 512 bytes and not 0
logs.resolution: Set ReceiveBufferSize to at least 512 bytes, or use 0 for system default

logs.message_template: KeepAlive must be On|Off
logs.reason: Logs an error when the KeepAlive parameter is not 'On' or 'Off'
logs.resolution: Set KeepAlive to either 'On' or 'Off'

logs.message_template: DisableReuse must be On|Off
logs.reason: Logs an error when the DisableReuse parameter is not 'On' or 'Off'
logs.resolution: Set DisableReuse to either 'On' or 'Off'

logs.message_template: EnableReuse must be On|Off
logs.reason: Logs an error when the EnableReuse parameter is not 'On' or 'Off'
logs.resolution: Set EnableReuse to either 'On' or 'Off'

logs.message_template: AddressTTL must be -1 or a number of seconds not exceeding
logs.reason: Logs an error when the AddressTTL parameter is invalid
logs.resolution: Set AddressTTL to -1 or a valid number of seconds below the maximum

logs.message_template: Route length must be < %d characters
logs.reason: Logs an error when the Route parameter exceeds the maximum length
logs.resolution: Shorten the Route value to stay within the length limit

logs.message_template: Redirect length must be < %d characters
logs.reason: Logs an error when the Redirect parameter exceeds the maximum length
logs.resolution: Shorten the Redirect value to stay within the length limit

logs.message_template: Unknown status parameter option
logs.reason: Logs an error when an invalid status option is provided
logs.resolution: Use valid status parameter options as per the documentation

logs.message_template: flushpackets must be on|off|auto
logs.reason: Logs an error when the flushpackets parameter is not 'on', 'off', or 'auto'
logs.resolution: Set flushpackets to one of the allowed values: 'on', 'off', or 'auto'

logs.message_template: flushwait has wrong format
logs.reason: Logs an error when the flushwait parameter format is invalid
logs.resolution: Provide flushwait in a valid time format (e.g., 10ms)

logs.message_template: flushwait must be <= 1s, or 0 for system default of 10 millseconds.
logs.reason: Logs an error when the flushwait parameter exceeds 1 second or is negative
logs.resolution: Set flushwait to be less than or equal to 1 second, or 0 for the default

logs.message_template: Ping/Pong timeout has wrong format
logs.reason: Logs an error when the ping timeout parameter format is invalid
logs.resolution: Provide the ping timeout in a valid time format (e.g., 30s)

logs.message_template: Ping/Pong timeout must be at least one millisecond
logs.reason: Logs an error when the ping timeout parameter is too small
logs.resolution: Increase the ping timeout to at least 1ms

logs.message_template: lbset must be between 0 and 99
logs.reason: Logs an error when the lbset parameter is outside the valid range
logs.resolution: Set lbset to a value between 0 and 99

logs.message_template: Connectiontimeout has wrong format
logs.reason: Logs an error when the connection timeout parameter format is invalid
logs.resolution: Provide the connection timeout in a valid time format (e.g., 30s)

logs.message_template: Connectiontimeout must be at least one millisecond.
logs.reason: Logs an error when the connection timeout parameter is too small
logs.resolution: Increase the connection timeout to at least 1ms

logs.message_template: flusher name length must be < %d characters
logs.reason: Logs an error when the flusher name exceeds the maximum length
logs.resolution: Shorten the flusher name to stay within the length limit

logs.message_template: Secret length must be < %d characters
logs.reason: Logs an error when the secret parameter exceeds the maximum length
logs.resolution: Shorten the secret value to stay within the length limit

logs.message_template: upgrade protocol length must be < %d characters
logs.reason: Logs an error when the upgrade protocol parameter exceeds the maximum length
logs.resolution: Shorten the upgrade protocol value to stay within the length limit

logs.message_template: ResponseFieldSize must be greater than 0 bytes, or 0 for system default.
logs.reason: Logs an error when the ResponseFieldSize parameter is negative
logs.resolution: Set ResponseFieldSize to a positive value or 0 for the system default

logs.message_template: multipathtcp must be On|Off
logs.reason: Logs an error when the multipathtcp parameter is not 'On' or 'Off'
logs.resolution: Set multipathtcp to either 'On' or 'Off'

logs.message_template: multipathtcp is not supported on your platform
logs.reason: Logs an error when multipathtcp is requested but not available on the current platform
logs.resolution: Remove the multipathtcp parameter or use a platform that supports it

logs.message_template: unknown Worker parameter
logs.reason: Logs an error when an unknown worker parameter is specified
logs.resolution: Check the parameter name and use only valid worker parameters

logs.message_template: stickysession length must be < %d characters
logs.reason: Logs an error when the stickysession parameter exceeds the maximum length
logs.resolution: Shorten the stickysession value to stay within the length limit

logs.message_template: stickysessionsep must be a single character or Off
logs.reason: Logs an error when the stickysessionsep parameter is neither a single character nor 'Off'
logs.resolution: Provide a single character or 'Off' for stickysessionsep

logs.message_template: failover must be On|Off
logs.reason: Logs an error when the failover parameter is not 'On' or 'Off'
logs.resolution: Set failover to either 'On' or 'Off'

logs.message_template: Timeout value has wrong format
logs.reason: Logs an error when the balancer Timeout parameter format is invalid
logs.resolution: Provide the Timeout value in a valid time format (e.g., 60s)

logs.message_template: Timeout must be at least ten milliseconds
logs.reason: Logs an error when the balancer Timeout parameter is too small
logs.resolution: Increase the Timeout value to at least 10ms

logs.message_template: maximum number of attempts must be a positive number
logs.reason: Logs an error when the maxattempts parameter is not positive
logs.resolution: Set maxattempts to a positive number

logs.message_template: unknown lbmethod
logs.reason: Logs an error when an unknown load balancing method is specified
logs.resolution: Use a valid load balancing method (e.g., 'byrequests', 'bytraffic', 'bybusyness')

logs.message_template: lbmethod name too large
logs.reason: Logs an error when the lbmethod name exceeds the maximum length
logs.resolution: Use a shorter lbmethod name

logs.message_template: scolonpathdelim must be On|Off
logs.reason: Logs an error when the scolonpathdelim parameter is not 'On' or 'Off'
logs.resolution: Set scolonpathdelim to either 'On' or 'Off'

logs.message_template: failonstatus must be one or more HTTP response codes
logs.reason: Logs an error when the failonstatus parameter contains invalid HTTP response codes
logs.resolution: Provide valid HTTP response codes for failonstatus (e.g., '500,503')

logs.message_template: failontimeout must be On|Off
logs.reason: Logs an error when the failontimeout parameter is not 'On' or 'Off'
logs.resolution: Set failontimeout to either 'On' or 'Off'

logs.message_template: Provided nonce is too large
logs.reason: Logs an error when the nonce parameter exceeds the maximum length
logs.resolution: Provide a shorter nonce value

logs.message_template: growth must be between 1 and 100
logs.reason: Logs an error when the growth parameter is outside the valid range
logs.resolution: Set growth to a value between 1 and 100

logs.message_template: forcerecovery must be On|Off
logs.reason: Logs an error when the forcerecovery parameter is not 'On' or 'Off'
logs.resolution: Set forcerecovery to either 'On' or 'Off'

logs.message_template: unknown Balancer parameter
logs.reason: Logs an error when an unknown balancer parameter is specified
logs.resolution: Check the parameter name and use only valid balancer parameters

logs.message_template: attempting to match URI path '%s' against %s '%s' for proxying
logs.reason: Debug log when attempting to match a URI against a proxy rule pattern
logs.resolution: Informational log, no resolution required

logs.message_template: proxying is explicitly disabled for URI path '%s'; declining
logs.reason: Logs when a URI path matches a proxy rule that explicitly disables proxying
logs.resolution: If proxying is needed for this path, remove or modify the rule that disables it

logs.message_template: Substitution in regular expression failed. Replacement too long?
logs.reason: Logs an error when substitution in a regular expression pattern fails
logs.resolution: Check and simplify the regular expression or ensure the replacement is not too long

logs.message_template: Unescaped URL path matched ProxyPass; ignoring unsafe nocanon
logs.reason: Warns when a URL path with unescaped characters matches a ProxyPass directive with nocanon
logs.resolution: Either properly escape the URL path or remove the nocanon option

logs.message_template: Servlet path '%s' (%s) matches proxy handler '%s'
logs.reason: Debug log when a servlet path matches a proxy handler
logs.resolution: Informational log, no resolution required

logs.message_template: URI path '%s' matches proxy handler '%s'
logs.reason: Debug log when a URI path matches a proxy handler
logs.resolution: Informational log, no resolution required

logs.message_template: ProxyDomain: domain name must start with a dot.
logs.reason: Logs an error when the ProxyDomain directive is not configured with a leading dot
logs.resolution: Ensure the domain name in ProxyDomain starts with a dot (e.g., '.example.com')

logs.message_template: ProxyErrorOverride: status codes to intercept must be numeric
logs.reason: Logs an error when non-numeric status codes are provided to ProxyErrorOverride
logs.resolution: Ensure all status codes provided to ProxyErrorOverride are numeric (e.g., 500, 502, 503)

logs.message_template: ProxyErrorOverride: status codes must follow a value of 'on'
logs.reason: Logs an error when status codes are provided but ProxyErrorOverride is not enabled
logs.resolution: First set 'ProxyErrorOverride On' before specifying status codes

logs.message_template: ProxyErrorOverride: status codes to intercept must be valid HTTP Status Codes >=400 && <600
logs.reason: Logs an error when invalid HTTP status codes are provided to ProxyErrorOverride
logs.resolution: Provide only valid HTTP error status codes (between 400 and 599)

logs.message_template: ProxyErrorOverride first parameter must be one of: off | on
logs.reason: Logs an error when the first parameter to ProxyErrorOverride is not 'off' or 'on'
logs.resolution: Use either 'on' or 'off' as the first parameter to ProxyErrorOverride

logs.message_template: ProxyAsyncDelay has wrong format
logs.reason: Logs an error when the ProxyAsyncDelay parameter format is invalid
logs.resolution: Provide ProxyAsyncDelay in a valid time format (e.g., '500ms', '1s') or '-1'

logs.message_template: ProxyAsyncIdleTimeout has wrong format
logs.reason: Logs an error when the ProxyAsyncIdleTimeout parameter format is invalid
logs.resolution: Provide ProxyAsyncIdleTimeout in a valid time format (e.g., '30s')

logs.message_template: ProxyReceiveBufferSize must be >= 512 bytes, or 0 for system default.
logs.reason: Logs an error when the ProxyReceiveBufferSize parameter is less than 512 bytes and not 0
logs.resolution: Set ProxyReceiveBufferSize to at least 512 bytes, or use 0 for the system default

logs.message_template: ProxyIOBufferSize must be >= 512 bytes, or 0 for system default.
logs.reason: Logs an error when the ProxyIOBufferSize parameter is less than 512 bytes and not 0
logs.resolution: Set ProxyIOBufferSize to at least 512 bytes, or use 0 for the system default

logs.message_template: Proxy Timeout must be at least 1 second.
logs.reason: Logs an error when the Proxy Timeout parameter is less than 1 second
logs.resolution: Increase the Proxy Timeout to at least 1 second

logs.message_template: ProxyVia must be one of: off | on | full | block
logs.reason: Logs an error when the ProxyVia parameter is not one of the allowed values
logs.resolution: Set ProxyVia to one of: 'off', 'on', 'full', or 'block'

logs.message_template: ProxyBadHeader must be one of: IsError | Ignore | StartBody
logs.reason: Logs an error when the ProxyBadHeader parameter is not one of the allowed values
logs.resolution: Set ProxyBadHeader to one of: 'IsError', 'Ignore', or 'StartBody'

logs.message_template: ProxyStatus must be one of: off | on | full
logs.reason: Logs an error when the ProxyStatus parameter is not one of the allowed values
logs.resolution: Set ProxyStatus to one of: 'off', 'on', or 'full'

logs.message_template: BalancerGrowth must be between 0 and 1000
logs.reason: Logs an error when the BalancerGrowth parameter is outside the valid range
logs.resolution: Set BalancerGrowth to a value between 0 and 1000

logs.message_template: BalancerMember can not have a balancer name when defined in a location
logs.reason: Logs an error when a BalancerMember directive incorrectly includes a balancer name inside a Location block
logs.resolution: Remove the balancer name when using BalancerMember inside a Location directive

logs.message_template: Invalid BalancerMember parameter. Parameter must be in the form 'key=value'
logs.reason: Logs an error when a BalancerMember parameter has an invalid format
logs.resolution: Ensure all parameters are in the 'key=value' format

logs.message_template: BalancerMember must define balancer name when outside <Proxy > section
logs.reason: Logs an error when a BalancerMember directive outside a Proxy section doesn't include a balancer name
logs.resolution: Include the balancer name when using BalancerMember outside a Proxy directive

logs.message_template: BalancerMember must define remote proxy server
logs.reason: Logs an error when a BalancerMember directive is missing the remote proxy server URL
logs.resolution: Provide a valid URL for the remote proxy server

logs.message_template: BalancerMember uses an invalid "unix:" URL
logs.reason: Logs an error when a BalancerMember directive contains an invalid Unix domain socket URL
logs.resolution: Check and correct the format of the unix: URL

logs.message_template: Defining worker '%s' for balancer '%s'
logs.reason: Debug log when defining a new worker for a balancer
logs.resolution: Informational log, no resolution required

logs.message_template: Defined worker '%s' for balancer '%s'
logs.reason: Logs when a worker has been successfully defined for a balancer
logs.resolution: Informational log, no resolution required

logs.message_template: Sharing worker '%s' instead of creating new worker '%s'
logs.reason: Logs when a worker is being shared rather than creating a new one
logs.resolution: Informational log, no resolution required

logs.message_template: Ignoring parameter '%s=%s' for worker '%s' because of worker sharing
logs.reason: Warns when a parameter for a shared worker is being ignored
logs.resolution: If you need different parameters, create a new worker instead of sharing

logs.message_template: < directive missing closing '>'
logs.reason: Logs an error when a Proxy or ProxyMatch directive is missing the closing angle bracket
logs.resolution: Add the missing closing '>' to the directive

logs.message_template: <ProxyMatch > block must specify a path
logs.reason: Logs an error when a ProxyMatch directive doesn't specify a path
logs.resolution: Provide a valid path pattern for the ProxyMatch directive

logs.message_template: <Proxy > block must specify a path
logs.reason: Logs an error when a Proxy directive doesn't specify a path
logs.resolution: Provide a valid path for the Proxy directive

logs.message_template: Regex could not be compiled
logs.reason: Logs an error when a regular expression pattern in a ProxyMatch directive could not be compiled
logs.resolution: Check and correct the regular expression syntax

logs.message_template: Multiple <ProxyMatch> arguments not (yet) supported.
logs.reason: Logs an error when multiple arguments are provided to a ProxyMatch directive
logs.resolution: Use only one argument per ProxyMatch directive

logs.message_template: > arguments are not supported for wildchar url.
logs.reason: Logs an error when arguments are provided to a Proxy directive with a wildcard URL
logs.resolution: Remove the arguments or use a specific URL instead of a wildcard

logs.message_template: > arguments are not supported for non url.
logs.reason: Logs an error when arguments are provided to a Proxy directive with a non-URL path
logs.resolution: Remove the arguments or use a proper URL

logs.message_template: <Proxy/ProxyMatch > uses an invalid "unix:" URL
logs.reason: Logs an error when a Proxy or ProxyMatch directive contains an invalid Unix domain socket URL
logs.resolution: Check and correct the format of the unix: URL

logs.message_template: > arguments are supported only for workers.
logs.reason: Logs an error when arguments are provided to a Proxy directive that doesn't define a worker
logs.resolution: Use arguments only with Proxy directives that define workers

logs.message_template: Invalid Proxy parameter. Parameter must be in the form 'key=value'
logs.reason: Logs an error when a Proxy parameter has an invalid format
logs.resolution: Ensure all parameters are in the 'key=value' format

logs.message_template: ProxyRemoteMatch: Bad syntax for a remote proxy server
logs.reason: Logs an error when a ProxyRemoteMatch directive has invalid syntax
logs.resolution: Correct the syntax to match 'regex-pattern remote-proxy-URL'

logs.message_template: ProxyRemote: Bad syntax for a remote proxy server
logs.reason: Logs an error when a ProxyRemote directive has invalid syntax
logs.resolution: Correct the syntax to match 'scheme|host|virtual-path|* remote-proxy-URL'

logs.message_template: ProxyRemoteMatch: Bad syntax for a remote proxy server (bad port number)
logs.reason: Logs an error when a ProxyRemoteMatch directive contains an invalid port number
logs.resolution: Provide a valid port number (1-65535) in the remote proxy URL

logs.message_template: ProxyRemote: Bad syntax for a remote proxy server (bad port number)
logs.reason: Logs an error when a ProxyRemote directive contains an invalid port number
logs.resolution: Provide a valid port number (1-65535) in the remote proxy URL

logs.message_template: Regular expression for ProxyRemoteMatch could not be compiled.
logs.reason: Logs an error when the regular expression in a ProxyRemoteMatch directive could not be compiled
logs.resolution: Check and correct the regular expression syntax

logs.message_template: ProxyPass invalid syntax ('~' usage).
logs.reason: Logs an error when a ProxyPass directive incorrectly uses the '~' character
logs.resolution: Use ProxyPassMatch instead of ProxyPass for regex patterns

logs.message_template: ProxyPass|ProxyPassMatch can not have a path when defined in a location.
logs.reason: Logs an error when a ProxyPass or ProxyPassMatch directive inside a Location block specifies a path
logs.resolution: Remove the path parameter when using inside a Location directive

logs.message_template: Invalid ProxyPass|ProxyPassMatch parameter. Parameter must be in the form 'key=value'.
logs.reason: Logs an error when a ProxyPass or ProxyPassMatch parameter has an invalid format
logs.resolution: Ensure all parameters are in the 'key=value' format

logs.message_template: unknown mapping
logs.reason: Logs an error when an unknown mapping type is specified in a ProxyPass or ProxyPassMatch directive
logs.resolution: Use a valid mapping type (e.g., 'encoded', 'servlet')

logs.message_template: ProxyPass|ProxyPassMatch needs a path when not defined in a location
logs.reason: Logs an error when a ProxyPass or ProxyPassMatch directive outside a Location block is missing a path
logs.resolution: Provide a valid path for the directive

logs.message_template: ProxyPass|ProxyPassMatch uses an invalid "unix:" URL
logs.reason: Logs an error when a ProxyPass or ProxyPassMatch directive contains an invalid Unix domain socket URL
logs.resolution: Check and correct the format of the unix: URL

logs.message_template: Regular expression could not be compiled.
logs.reason: Logs an error when the regular expression in a ProxyPassMatch directive could not be compiled
logs.resolution: Check and correct the regular expression syntax

logs.message_template: ProxyPassReverse needs a path when not defined in a location
logs.reason: Logs an error when a ProxyPassReverse directive outside a Location block is missing a path
logs.resolution: Provide a valid path for the directive

logs.message_template: ProxyPassReverse can not have a path when defined in a location
logs.reason: Logs an error when a ProxyPassReverse directive inside a Location block specifies a path
logs.resolution: Remove the path parameter when using inside a Location directive

logs.message_template: NoProxy for %s
logs.reason: Debug log indicating a host or URL is configured to bypass the proxy
logs.resolution: Informational log, no resolution required

logs.message_template: UseProxy for %s
logs.reason: Debug log indicating a host or URL should use the proxy
logs.resolution: Informational log, no resolution required

logs.message_template: proxy_handler no URL in %s
logs.reason: Logs an error when a proxy request is missing a URL
logs.resolution: Ensure the request contains a valid URL

logs.message_template: Max-Forwards value '%s' could not be parsed
logs.reason: Logs a warning when the Max-Forwards header contains an invalid value
logs.resolution: Ensure the Max-Forwards header contains a valid non-negative integer

logs.message_template: Max-Forwards request header could not be parsed
logs.reason: Logs an error when the Max-Forwards header cannot be parsed
logs.resolution: Fix the client to send a valid Max-Forwards header

logs.message_template: Max-Forwards has reached zero - proxy loop?
logs.reason: Logs a warning when the Max-Forwards header reaches zero, indicating a possible proxy loop
logs.resolution: Check proxy configuration for loops or misconfiguration

logs.message_template: TRACE forbidden by server configuration
logs.reason: Logs an error when a TRACE request is forbidden by server configuration
logs.resolution: If TRACE requests should be allowed, modify the TraceEnable directive

logs.message_template: TRACE with request body is not allowed
logs.reason: Logs an error when a TRACE request with a body is received
logs.resolution: TRACE requests should not include a body; fix the client

logs.message_template: Trying to run scheme_handler against proxy
logs.reason: Debug log indicating an attempt to run a scheme handler against a proxy
logs.resolution: Informational log, no resolution required

logs.message_template: Using proxy auth creds %s
logs.reason: Debug log indicating the use of proxy authentication credentials
logs.resolution: Informational log, no resolution required

logs.message_template: Running scheme %s handler (attempt %d)
logs.reason: Debug log when running a scheme handler
logs.resolution: Informational log, no resolution required

logs.message_template: No protocol handler was valid for the URL %s (scheme '%s'). If you are using a DSO version of mod_proxy, make sure the proxy submodules are included in the configuration using LoadModule.
logs.reason: Logs an error when no suitable protocol handler is found for a URL, likely due to missing proxy submodule
logs.resolution: Ensure the appropriate proxy submodule (e.g., mod_proxy_http, mod_proxy_ftp) is loaded using LoadModule

logs.message_template: Domain missing: %s sent to %s%s%s
logs.reason: Logs an informational message when a domain is missing in a request
logs.resolution: Informational log, no resolution required as the proxy will automatically add the domain

logs.message_template: could not init proxy_mutex in child
logs.reason: Logs a critical error when the proxy mutex cannot be initialized in a child process
logs.resolution: Check file permissions and available system resources; may require server restart

logs.message_template: failed to create %s mutex
logs.reason: Logs a critical error when the proxy mutex cannot be created during post-configuration
logs.resolution: Check file permissions and available system resources; may require server restart

logs.message_template: ProxySourceAddress invalid value
logs.reason: Logs an error when the ProxySourceAddress directive contains an invalid IP address
logs.resolution: Provide a valid IP address for ProxySourceAddress
